cast.name: 文森特·多诺费奥 Vincent D'Onofrio
詹姆斯·鲍德温 James Baldwin

this_title: Citizen Jane: Battle for the City
trans_title: 市民简·雅各布斯：城市规划之战
introduction: In 1960 Jane Jacobs’s book The Death and Life of Great American Cities sent shockwaves through the architecture and planning worlds, with its exploration of the consequences of modern planners’ and architects’ reconfiguration of cities. Jacobs was also an activist, who was involved in many fights in mid-century New York, to stop “master builder” Robert Moses from running roughs...
chinese_title: 市民简·雅各布斯：城市规划之战
foreign_title: Citizen Jane: Battle for the City
